statements: SELECT * FROM LivestockMortality WHERE animal_type = 'Cow';
SELECT id, cause_of_death FROM LivestockMortality WHERE mortality_rate > 0.05;
SELECT animal_type, date_of_death FROM LivestockMortality ORDER BY date_of_death DESC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockMortality WHERE cause_of_death LIKE '%disease%';
SELECT id, animal_type, mortality_rate FROM LivestockMortality ORDER BY mortality_rate ASC;
SELECT id, animal_type, date_of_death FROM LivestockMortality WHERE cause_of_death = 'Natural Causes';
SELECT animal_type, cause_of_death, mortality_rate FROM LivestockMortality WHERE mortality_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY date_of_death DESC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockMortality ORDER BY cause_of_death ASC, date_of_death DESC;
SELECT AVG(mortality_rate) AS average_mortality_rate, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM LivestockMortality WHERE animal_type = 'Cattle';
SELECT animal_type, COUNT(id) AS total_deaths FROM LivestockMortality GROUP BY animal_type HAVING COUNT(id) > 2 ORDER BY total_deaths DESC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockMortality ORDER BY date_of_death DESC;
SELECT animal_type, cause_of_death FROM LivestockMortality WHERE cause_of_death = 'Disease';
SELECT id, health_status FROM HerdHealthManagement WHERE health_status = 'Healthy' ORDER BY id;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_count FROM LivestockMortality;
SELECT * FROM HerdHealthManagement WHERE management_strategy LIKE '%vaccination%';
SELECT id, animal_type, cause_of_death, date_of_death FROM LivestockMortality WHERE animal_type='cow' ORDER BY date_of_death DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, animal_type, health_status, management_strategy FROM HerdHealthManagement WHERE health_status='good' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT cause_of_death, COUNT(*) AS death_count FROM LivestockMortality GROUP BY cause_of_death ORDER BY death_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockMortality JOIN HerdHealthManagement ON LivestockMortality.animal_type = HerdHealthManagement.animal_type WHERE LivestockMortality.cause_of_death='disease';
SELECT id, animal_type FROM LivestockMortality UNION SELECT id, animal_type FROM HerdHealthManagement ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM LivestockMortality;
SELECT livestock_id, mortality_cause, mortality_date FROM LivestockMortality ORDER BY mortality_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT mortality_cause FROM LivestockMortality WHERE mortality_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT livestock_name, birth_date, livestock_type FROM Livestock WHERE herd_id = 1;
SELECT herd_name, total_livestock FROM Herd WHERE total_livestock > 50;
SELECT * FROM LivestockMortality WHERE mortality_cause='Disease';
SELECT livestock_name, birth_date FROM Livestock ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT mortality_date, mortality_cause FROM LivestockMortality WHERE mortality_cause LIKE '%accident%' ORDER BY mortality_date ASC;
SELECT herd_name, total_livestock FROM Herd WHERE total_livestock > 50;
SELECT lm.mortality_date, l.livestock_name, h.herd_name FROM LivestockMortality lm JOIN Livestock l ON lm.livestock_id = l.id JOIN Herd h ON l.herd_id = h.id;
SELECT * FROM Livestock ORDER BY ID DESC;
SELECT Name, Species FROM Livestock WHERE Species='Cow';
SELECT Age, DateOfBirth FROM Livestock WHERE Age >= 5;
SELECT Livestock.Name, HerdHealth.HealthStatus FROM Livestock JOIN HerdHealth ON Livestock.ID = HerdHealth.LivestockID;

SELECT Livestock.Name, MortalityRecords.CauseOfDeath, MortalityRecords.DateOfDeath FROM Livestock JOIN MortalityRecords ON Livestock.ID = MortalityRecords.LivestockID WHERE MortalityRecords.DateOfDeath BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ID, Name, Species FROM Livestock WHERE Age > 5 ORDER BY Name DESC
SELECT * FROM MortalityRecords WHERE DateOfDeath BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY RecordID ASC

SELECT Livestock.Name, HerdHealth.HealthStatus, HerdHealth.LastCheckupDate FROM Livestock INNER JOIN HerdHealth ON Livestock.ID = HerdHealth.LivestockID WHERE HerdHealth.HealthStatus = 'Healthy' AND Livestock.Species = 'Cattle'

SELECT Livestock.Name, MortalityRecords.CauseOfDeath, MortalityRecords.DateOfDeath FROM Livestock LEFT JOIN MortalityRecords ON Livestock.ID = MortalityRecords.LivestockID ORDER BY MortalityRecords.DateOfDeath DESC

SELECT ManagementStrategies.Name, ManagementStrategies.Description, COUNT(*) AS StrategyCount FROM ManagementStrategies GROUP BY ManagementStrategies.Name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY StrategyCount DESC
SELECT * FROM livestock_mortality_records;
SELECT id, cause_of_death, mortality_date FROM livestock_mortality_records;
SELECT mortality_date, cause_of_death, livestock_id FROM livestock_mortality_records ORDER BY mortality_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM livestock_mortality_records WHERE cause_of_death='Accident';
SELECT id, mortality_date FROM livestock_mortality_records WHERE livestock_id=101;
SELECT * FROM livestock_mortality_records WHERE cause_of_death = 'Disease' ORDER BY mortality_date DESC
SELECT id, cause_of_death, mortality_date FROM livestock_mortality_records WHERE livestock_id = 3 ORDER BY id
SELECT cause_of_death, COUNT(*) AS death_count FROM livestock_mortality_records GROUP BY cause_of_death HAVING death_count > 1 ORDER BY death_count DESC
SELECT * FROM livestock_mortality_records WHERE cause_of_death LIKE '%accident%' ORDER BY mortality_date ASC
SELECT livestock_id, MAX(mortality_date) AS latest_death_date FROM livestock_mortality_records GROUP BY livestock_id ORDER BY latest_death_date DESC
